body:
Does anyone know a good map building server where I can build a map if so email me or skype me !

Email : Willbob101@hotmail.com
body_tagged:
Does anyone know a good map building server where I can build a map if so email me or skype me !

Email : Willbob101@hotmail.com
title: Anyone know a map building server ?

replies.body: Hello, ElementProHD! I am, too, interested in building a map, do you want to work together?
replies.body_tagged: Hello, ElementProHD! I am, too, interested in building a map, do you want to work together?

replies.body:
ElementProHD, if you want to build a map, there's a way without having to use a server. You can get liteloader (quite difficult to download, use a video) and that has world edit. You can start a singleplayer world and use that for your map.

Hope I helped!
replies.body_tagged:

Hope I helped!

replies.body: The only problem is you need a good computer to paste a lot of blocks, or just set more ram to Minecraft and you will be good.
replies.body_tagged: The only problem is you need a good computer to paste a lot of blocks, or just set more ram to Minecraft and you will be good.
